title: Bokurano Alternative - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Horror   Mature   Mecha   Mystery   Psychological   Sci-fi   Seinen   Tragedy
author: Kitoh Mohiro   Renji Ohki
description:
During a summer camp, 15 children were chosen to pilot a giant 500m tall robot to defend the earth.

An alternate retelling of the Bokurano manga.>
